lines.text: Do you always gin up your women?
You're more than just a woman to me. You're like a shower of milk from heaven!

[eating a bowl of pasta]
Whoever thought of spaghetti was a genius. He must have made a damn fortune.
I could put the next bullet between your eyes! But you're not gonna die that easy, punk!
I'm... I'm not a goddamn female!
That's one way you can tell the difference between a man and a woman. A man can spit, and a woman can't!
